summary: Comprehensive testing of Stripe checkout button fix and dashboard layout reorder. All features working correctly. Stripe checkout redirects to Stripe successfully. Dashboard layout follows user-specified order.

App.js: Dashboard layout correctly reordered per user specification
QuoteOfDay.jsx: Properly blurred for free users with Premium label
subscription.py: Backend checkout API generating valid Stripe URLs

seed_data_creation: Test users created for checkout testing are auto-cleaned by unique random IDs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features tested and working. Stripe checkout button redirects to Stripe checkout page successfully. Dashboard layout follows correct order: 1) Quote of Day (blurred for free), 2) Add Expense/Income forms, 3) Totals Summary, 4) Budget Manager & Investment Portfolio tabs, 5) Transactions & Analytics buttons (hidden by default), 6) Financial Health Snapshot, 7) What Changed?

Quote of Day visible for premium/admin ✅
